5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Umar said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to pray (voluntary prayers) at night two by two, and he would pray one Rak’ah of Witr.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوِتْرِ بِرَكْعَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Praying one Rak’ah for Witr
